alert.note: Alert for Dutchess; Ulster (New York) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Albany (Eastern New York and Western New England)
info.headline: Flood Warning issued December 23 at 6:59AM EST until December 23 at 8:38PM EST by NWS Albany
info.description: ...FLOOD WARNING IN EFFECT UNTIL THIS EVENING... * WHAT...Minor flooding is forecast. * WHERE...Hudson River Near Poughkeepsie. * WHEN...Until this evening. * IMPACTS...At 4.2 feet, Minor flood stage. Minor flooding of lowlands, boat docks and boat launches. Water covers State Route 213 in Eddyville. * ADDITIONAL DETAILS... - At 6:45 AM EST Friday the stage was 1.2 feet. - Forecast...The river rise above flood stage with a maximum value of 5.7 feet this afternoon. - Flood stage is 4.2 feet. - Flood History...This crest compares to a previous crest of 5.2 feet on 12/25/2020. - http://www.weather.gov/safety/flood && Hudson River Poughkeepsie Flood Stage: 4.2 Observed Stage at Fri 6 am: 1.2 Forecast: Fri 7 am 2.1 Fri 1 pm 5.5 Fri 7 pm 0.9 Sat 1 am 1.6 Sat 7 am -1.8 Sat 1 pm 2.4 Sat 7 pm -1.5 Sun 1 am 1.3 Sun 7 am -1.9 Sun 1 pm MSG Sun 7 pm MSG Mon 1 am MSG &&
